meanings.definition: A plant of the geranium genus, typically having pink or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: I planted a beautiful geranium in my garden.
meanings.sent2: The geraniums in the park bloom every spring.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid his acorns in the geranium pot.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as vibrant as a blooming geranium.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the geranium danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A bright red color resembling that of a geranium flower.
meanings.sent1: She painted her front door in a striking geranium shade.
meanings.sent2: The artist used geranium hues to create a vivid sunset.
meanings.sent3: The chef's apron was splattered with geranium-colored sauce.
meanings.sent4: The sky turned a deep geranium red as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The room glowed with the warm tones of geranium walls.
